text: Hélio César Rosas (24 March 1929 – 8 February 2022) was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1987 to 1999. Rosas died on 8 February 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Politicians from São Paulo (state)
title: Hélio Rosas
